article_title: Triangle United Way commits $1M to buy health insurance for Durham County's neediest
article_text: The United Way of the Greater Triangle has created a financial assistance program to help low-income residents in Durham County obtain health insurance at no monthly cost. The unusual approach, funded by an anonymous donor, will pay monthly insurance dues that are not covered by federal subsidies under the Affordable Care Act.

article_metadata.news-keywords: United Way, PremiumHelp, Premium, Insurance, Navigators, Blue Cross, Blue Shield, Affordable Care Act, Obamacare, subsidies, Durham County
